effect.name: Regeneration
effect.description: At the start of your turn, restore 1 HP.

effect.name: Revive
effect.description: When taking fatal damage, restore to Max HP and refresh intent.

effect.name: Entangled
effect.description: Increases Move Item's Energy cost by 1.

effect.name: Poison
effect.description: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP.

effect.name: Rusty
effect.description: Double your Skill Item's Durability loss.

effect.name: Strength Down
effect.description: Decrease your attack damage by X this turn.

effect.name: One-use Strength
effect.description: Increase your next attack damage by X.

effect.name: Stone Form
effect.description: Reduces all damage taken to 0. Target will not have intent this turn.

effect.name: Erosion
effect.description: When taking fatal damage, turn into Stone Form for 2 turn, rallies 2 new silverfish, increases Max HP and attack count.

effect.name: Dragon Scale
effect.description: Can only lose X more HP this turn.

power.name: Frighten
power.description: When taking more than 15 damage, randomly teleports 1 block and gains 1 Strength.

power.name: Heal Overdose
power.description: At the start of your turn, evoke all Regeneration at once.

power.name: Shield Buffer
power.description: Shield won't wears off at the start of your turn.

power.name: Glass Cannon
power.description: Target takes 50% more damage and deals 50% more damage.

power.name: Thorn
power.description: On hurt, deal 4 damage back to the attacker.

power.name: Undying Shell
power.description: When taking fatal damage, revives after 5 rounds. Dies when the Boss is defeated.

power.name: Enraged
power.description: Any player summon an anvil, gains 1 Strength.

area_effect.name: Fire Area
area_effect.description: At the start of each turn, takes X*2 damage.

area_effect.name: Rail Area
area_effect.description: Your Move Item's Energy cost is set to 0.

area_effect.name: Crimson Area
area_effect.description: When losing HP, gains 5 Shield and 5 Regeneration.

area_effect.name: DragonBreath Area
area_effect.description: At the end of each turn, loses (your current energy * 2 + 1) health.
